name: major_project
description: - 1st : Click CODE button and download zip file     - 2nd : Right click on zip folder then click Extract all      - 3rd : Open Major project folder in vscode      - 4th : Install all package - Type command in terminal -> npm i     - 5th : Data initialize - Type command in terminal -> node init/index.js     - 6th : Run server - Type command in terminal -> node app.js
author: Akash deep
